#creating some vectors in r
```{r}
#vectors must contain elements of the same data type ----
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

marmots

class(marmots)
```


```{r}
# Create and store the vector ----
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)

# Return it ----
pika

# Check the class ----
class(pika)
```


```{r}
# Create the integer vector ----
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)

# Look at it ----
bear

# Check the class ----
class(bear) 
```

##vector math

```{r}
# Create two vectors -----
ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

# Addition ----
ringtail + fox

# Subtraction ----
fox - ringtail

# Scalar multiplier ----
100 * ringtail

# Dot product ----
ringtail %*% fox
```
